Source.Name: nasc
Source.Summary: NaSC is an app where you do math like a normal person
Source.Description: It’s an app where you do math like a normal person. It lets you type whatever you want and smartly figures out what is math and spits out an answer on the right pane.

Package.Name: nasc
Package.Summary: NaSC is an app where you do math like a normal person
